text: You can use After before pseudo elements of css to do this
Hi, how to do a condition on a module (Date and Time) if my set date and time has passed i want to display a the event is ended. Is this possible on HubSpot?

Hi Bradon, i have a custom module end_date (module name) type is Date and Time, I set a date on my custom module end_date march 31, 2022. So my condition is if march 31 has passed ("Date has passed") Date is still ongoing.
